title: Hillary Clinton: GOP Plots to "Literally Steal" 2024 Election
itunes:title: Hillary Clinton: GOP Plots to "Literally Steal" 2024 Election
description: Hillary Clinton just claimed "Right-wing extremists already have a plan to literally steal the next presidential election, and they're not making a secret of it." Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team discuss this stunning claim and more today on Sekulow.
content:encoded: Hillary Clinton just claimed "Right-wing extremists already have a plan to literally steal the next presidential election, and they're not making a secret of it." Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team discuss this stunning claim and more today on Sekulow.
itunes:subtitle: Hillary Clinton just claimed "Right-wing extremists already have a plan to literally steal the next presidential election, and they're not making a secret of it." Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team discuss this stunning claim and more today...
itunes:author: Jay Sekulow
